steps.step: Navigate to the ParaBank login page at https://parabank.parasoft.com/parabank/index.htm
Enter the valid username 'ficusroot' in the username field
Enter the valid password 'katal@n@ravi' in the password field
Click the 'Log In' button
Verify the user is redirected to the account overview page (EXPECT: SUCCESS)
Verify the account overview page URL contains '/overview.htm'
Verify the 'Welcome' message displays the customer name
Verify the 'Accounts Overview' heading is present
Verify the available accounts are listed with account numbers and balances
Verify the right side navigation menu displays banking options
Verify the 'Log Out' link is visible in the top navigation
Navigate to the ParaBank login page at https://parabank.parasoft.com/parabank/index.htm
Enter the invalid username 'invaliduser' in the username field
Enter the valid password 'katal@n@ravi' in the password field
Click the 'Log In' button
Verify the login fails and the user remains on the login page (EXPECT: FAILURE)
Navigate to the ParaBank login page at https://parabank.parasoft.com/parabank/index.htm
Enter the valid username 'ficusroot' in the username field
Enter the invalid password 'invalidpass' in the password field
Click the 'Log In' button
Verify the login fails and the user remains on the login page (EXPECT: FAILURE)

testName: Login with empty username and password

steps.step: Navigate to the ParaBank login page at https://parabank.parasoft.com/parabank/index.htm
Leave the username field empty
Leave the password field empty
Click the 'Log In' button
Verify the login fails and the user remains on the login page (EXPECT: FAILURE)

testName: Login with special characters in username and password

steps.step: Navigate to the ParaBank login page at https://parabank.parasoft.com/parabank/index.htm
Enter the username with special characters '!@#$%^&*()' in the username field
Enter the password with special characters '!@#$%^&*()' in the password field
Click the 'Log In' button
Verify the login fails and the user remains on the login page (EXPECT: FAILURE)
